Title: Relates to the effect of the entry of judgment on certain rights attendant to a cause of action
Summary: Provides that no right, benefit, or advantage that attends a cause of action shall be lost when the cause of action is successfully reduced to a judgment, but shall be deemed to append to the judgment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the effect of the entry of judgment on certain rights attendant to a cause of action
